snippet: Jasjit Bhattal, chief executive of Nomura's wholesale banking division, retired on Tuesday after less than two years in the position.
abstract: Jasjit Bhattal, chief executive of Nomura's wholesale banking division, retired on Tuesday after less than two years in the position.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- Jasjit Bhattal, chief executive of Nomura Holding's wholesale banking division, retired on Tuesday after less than a year in the position.
